name: Game Shows 4 Quiz | Mixture: Game Shows | 10 Questions

questions.text: Game show hosts Jack Narz and Tom Kennedy are brothers.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Both have hosted various game shows.

questions.text: Which of the following did *not* host 'It's News To Me'?
Who was the host of 'Almost Anything Goes'?

questions.explanation:
Wheel Of Fortune.

	All the rest had two.

questions.text: On what subject did Jack Benny win $64 on the '$64,000 Question'?
questions.explanation:
Violins.

	He actually could play the violin.

questions.text: Which of the following game shows was *not* hosted by Bill Cullen?
questions.explanation:
Break The Bank.

	He has hosted all the others at one time or another. 'Break The Bank' was hosted by Bud Collyer.

questions.text: Which of the following was *not* a producer of a game show?
questions.explanation:
Bill Cullen.

	A noted game show host but not a producer.

questions.text: Which of the following was *not* a game show announcer?
questions.explanation:
Jack Paar.

	Jack Paar was the host of the 'Tonight' show before Johnny Carson.

questions.text: Wink Martindale hosted all of the following shows except which?
questions.explanation:
Hollywood Squares.

	The original 'Hollywood Squares' was hosted by Peter Marshall.
